name: Fathom (Buldozer)
description:
Fathom is a 2D fishing game in which you discover the secrets hiding under the fisherman's boat. What mysteries do the depths hold? Can you catch enough to last for another day? 

Created as a part of the No Fun II: Queer to Play Game Jam.

Controls: Space bar

Creators:

Josef Šmíd, Jamie E. Rose, Stepanka Breckova, Jitka Uhrickova

Work in progress
